items.strItemDescription: A cape crafted by Yashta from a Glow Tree sapling from Pellow Village. This one is darker than normal for Black Friday 2014! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
This gift was infused with tainted love oh oh oh, tainted love, say it ain't so! This was available for Black Friday 2014!
A helm crafted by Yashta from a Glow Tree sapling from Pellow Village. This one is darker than normal for Black Friday 2014! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
Crafted by the mysterious Cronix to celebrate the day of his birth, this weapon has been temporally shifted for Black Friday 2014! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
Transcendence was drained of its color for all those worthy of using it for Black Friday 2014! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
